word:
I am distressed when I think of these brethren whom I love in the Lord, and who are not taking a Bible course as presented 
                                                                           1143
in the lessons of Christ, to be one as Christ is one with the Father, that, according to the prayer of Christ, the Father may love them as he loves his only begotten Son. The divine imprint is not on any man's work who does not exercise every faculty God has given him to answer the prayer of Christ for complete unity.
